title: Consistent lagg all day?
body: What's up? It happens whenever I engage in combat with a champion, ruining any chances I have at successful games. I have almost broken another keyboard in frustration. Fix rito. It aint on my end.

replies.body: Is it that your ping is becoming exceedingly high or is it that your frame-rate is dropping?

This sounds like PC lag if it is happening during combat. I'm not sure of your PC setup, but have you tried turning some of the video settings down to see if that helps?

Are you seeing your FPS getting hit or your ping?

Sorry for super late reply, no fps hits, just straight up dc/lagging. My setup can handle 120+ fps easily without even sweating so it's not that. Upon further inspection, these little dc's which I thought happened in fights are seemingly random, but relatively common (about 8 times in a forty minute game)

Just a quick update, If you run an ATI based graphics card as I do make sure you use v-sync. League Of Legends runs on DirectX as its graphics API where as ATI cards are built with OpenGL in mind, there seems to be a heavy translation cost in League which will cause certain actions to lag.

Things that can cause drop in FPS:

Moving things from buffer to buffer
Particle effects being buffered and then rendered

Tl;dr you have two options, get a very new card like mine (R9 280x), I play uncapped at about 300fps but when i enter fights it can drop to around 65. Or go with nVidia which seem to do DirectX rendering a lot better.
